repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript contains the later part of the Laghuśabdenduśekhara and it is clearly mentioned in the colophon and the front blank folio. Something is scribbled on left side of blank folio after the front guard folio. At the centre is written (line 1) (2 illegible letters) cāryyasya siddhāntakaumudivyākhyānaṃ (line 2) laghuśabdenduśekharaṃ uttarārdham. Some matter in Granth script at the end before the back guard folio. It is a list and does not seem to be realted to the text.

msItem.title: Laghuśabdenduśekhara
msItem.author: Nagojibhaṭṭa
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) maṅgalādinī maṅgalamadhyāni maṃgalāntāni ca śāstrāṇī prathante iti bhāṣyokte vighnavidhānādyarthaṃ granthamadhye katamaṃgalaṃ śiṣya 1v2 śikṣārthaṃ nibadhnāti śrautrārhantīti śrautraṃ śrotriyatvaṃ vedādhyayanakarttṛtvaṃ arhanti yogyatā tadvihitakarmā tṛṣṇā ātvaṃ (1 illegible) bhyāṃ
msItem.explicit: (174v 6) syodāharaṇaṃ āha lā bhavantīti ālo iti śabdaviśeṣānukaraṇa iti tat bhāṣyakṛta iti sarveṣṭasiddhiḥ
msItem.finalRubric: iti mahopādhyāyopanā 9 makaśivabhaṭṭasutasatigarbhajanāgo(ja)[jī]bhaṭṭaviracita (lacuna 2 letters) śabdenduśekhare siddhāntakaumudīvyākhyāne uttarārdhaḥ samāptaḥ

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 1 blank folio, 174 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals used in the left margin of the vesro of folio.
supportDesc.condition: Good state inspite of many holes caused by insects. Wormholes affecting the continuity of the text.

handNote.desc: Broad and sharp stroke characters. At the end the hand writing is very

additions.desc: oṃ written in the left margin on 1v.
Number 19 written in pencil and number 35 in the pink chalk.

binding.p: The red woolen thread and also hemp is used to tie.

encodingDesc.p: Round brackets are used to show the illegible letters. Square bracket to used to show correction for wrong spelling in the manuscript.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) (śubha)mastu maṅgalādinī maṅgalamadhyāni maṃgalāntāni ca śāstrāṇī prathante iti bhāṣyokte vighnavidhānādyarthaṃ granthamadhye katamaṃgalaṃ śiṣya (1v 2) śikṣārthaṃ nibadhnāti śrautrārhantīti śrautraṃ śrotriyatvaṃ vedādhyayanakarttṛtvaṃ arhanti yogyatā tadvihitakarmā tṛṣṇā ātvaṃ (1 illegible) bhyāṃ
(174v 6) syodāharaṇaṃ āha lā bhavantīti ālo iti śabdaviśeṣānukaraṇa iti tat bhāṣyakṛta iti sarveṣṭasiddhiḥ (174v 7) (laghu)śabdenduśekharaḥ putro jyeṣṭho caiva kanyakā svamatau samyagutpādya śivayorarpitau mayā pari[bhāṣe]nduśe 8 kharassoyaṃ phaṇibhāṣyoktabhuṣitaḥ satyāṃ ha(lacuna 1 letter) t kamaleṣvā yāvatcandradivākarau iti mahopādhyāyopanā 9 makaśivabhaṭṭasutasatigarbhajanāgo(ja)[jī]bhaṭṭaviracita (lacuna 2 letters) śabdenduśekhare siddhāntakaumudīvyākhyāne uttarārdhaḥ samāptaḥ
